title: Cannot connect to game
body: Started a ranked que. Everyone picks their champs. Game tries to load, but it's just a black screen. After a while it says 'can't connect to server'. I tried reloading the client and rejoining the game 4 times, but couldn't. The whole time I was getting 14ms pinging off of google so it wasn't on my end. Happened to me a couple weeks ago too. As usual, there's no 'official' server issues. So I lose 23 LP for something I had no control over. Sigh.

replies.body: This black screen is usually caused by a connection problem failing to reach the game server, so it can't download any assets.  Your ping might be fine, but you still need to connect to the server.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
